songs.title: Calaso Livin’
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Smoking on the pipe that’s how we do it when we walking in the building
Smoking on strong you can smell it when we walk up in the building
Listen don’t worry, I can [?]

[Pre-Chorus]
Smoking on the pipe that’s how we do it when we walking in the building
Smoking on strong you can smell it when we walk up in the building
OG wear my cologne you can smell it in the building
I putting on baby girl it’s the boss way I’m living

[Chorus]
Calaso livin, Calaso livin, Calaso livin, Calaso livin, Calaso livin
If you mix me with the peyon
Calaso livin, Calaso livin, Calaso livin, Calaso livin, Calaso livin
If you mix me with the peyon

[Verse 1]
Imma boss lil bitch that falls for my motherfucking peyon
Calaso livin, the type of shit I be on
I’m tryna stay on the cool and get my Bobby V on
Miss all of a sudden she tryna put her handcuffs on me
Walking in the club, smoking out of town
Bitch you better careful how the PeeWee be
Calaso livin
And she midget but the crowds in the city screaming I’m all in
Treppin I’m trippin’ I'm breaking her promise
Still trippin’ in PeeWee
I’m tryna get a minute
Feeling like me mini coster out here in my city
Bitch is like who is he
A motherfucking superstar or a genie
This nigga moving like Odeni
Park the fuck up in a G Star Benz
They call OG priest
You looking at my wrist ain’t happy
[?]
Cocaine, several white chicks to a whole lot of people
Seventeen not illegal
Smoking out the the project me and my nigga no dare they call that illegal
Calaso livin

[Pre-Chorus]
Smoking on the pipe that’s how we do it when we walking in the building
Smoking on strong you can smell it when we walk up in the building
OG wear my cologne you can smell it in the building
I ain’t putting on baby girl it’s the boss way I’m living

[Chorus]
Calaso livin, Calaso livin, Calaso livin, Calaso livin, Calaso livin
If you mix me with the peyon
Calaso livin, Calaso livin, Calaso livin, Calaso livin, Calaso livin
If you mix me with the peyon

[Verse 2]
Living calaso I serving the best
Bitch you can mix me with Dion
That ain’t the shit that I be on
Two white ducks set trends for the john
Hard to become
OG wearing my cologne
You can smell it in the building we blowing all strong
Bitch I’m a boss in the roof up and all
PeeWee Longway money long
She can participate every time I step
BBS diamond on my neck, Michael Phelp
[?]
Busting them bands I plan a [?]
Smoking out the pack Calaso livin
It cost to be a nigga like me
Dropping the top on the [?] smoking OG
You will never find a peyon
Ain’t no pressure this cash Imma keep it a dream
[?]
One more diamond in my [?] ring
Sipping my cocktail and everything
Calaso livin smokin Mary Jane
No nigga ain’t see me put it on everything

[Pre-Chorus]
Smoking on the pipe that’s how we do it when we walking in the building
Smoking on strong you can smell it when we walk up in the building
OG wear my cologne you can smell it in the building
I ain’t putting on baby girl it’s the boss way I’m living

[Chorus]
Calaso livin, Calaso livin, Calaso livin, Calaso livin, Calaso livin
If you mix me with the peyon
Calaso livin, Calaso livin, Calaso livin, Calaso livin, Calaso livin
If you mix me with the peyon
